talk.abstract: Conventional wisdom says that no one deploys web applications on Windows. I ship Python backed web sites on Windows that are cumulatively visited by 1 in 50 Canadians every month. This talk will cover my experience with deploying Python based web applications on Windows, why you might want to do this and and the horrors in store for you if you choose to sacrifice your sanity and dive in.
talk.bio: Chris Lambacher has been programming in Python for 10 years and currently deploys Python web apps to Windows servers and Linux based embedded systems.
talk.description: Conventional wisdom says that no one deploys web applications on Windows. I ship Python backed web sites on Windows that are cumulatively visited by 1 in 50 Canadians every month. This talk will cover my experience with deploying Python based web applications on Windows, why you might want to do this and and the horrors in store for you if you choose to sacrifice your sanity and dive in.
talk.name: Everything you wanted to know about deploying web apps on Windows but were too horrified to ask
talk.title: Everything you wanted to know about deploying web apps on Windows but were too horrified to ask
